name: STMT_HB_DETAIL
description: This table contains Hospital Billing information about your statement print and detail bill records.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement print or detail bill record.

columns.name: PREV_PAT_BAL
columns.description: The Hospital Billing outstanding self-pay balance for the guarantor from the previous statement.

columns.name: PREV_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The Hospital Billing amount due for the guarantor from the previous statement. It only includes outstanding self-pay balances not on a payment plan.

columns.name: NEW_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new adjustment amount.

columns.name: TOT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing total charge amount.

columns.name: TOT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing total payment amount.

columns.name: TOT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing total adjustment amount.

columns.name: CURR_PAT_BAL
columns.description: The Hospital Billing outstanding self-pay balance for the guarantor.

columns.name: CURR_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The Hospital Billing amount due for the guarantor. It only includes outstanding self-pay balances not on a payment plan.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_TOT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing payment plan total amount.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_BAL
columns.description: The Hospital Billing payment plan balance.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DUE
columns.description: The Hospital Billing payment plan due amount.

columns.name: INS_PORTION_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing insurance portion amount.

columns.name: PAT_PORTION_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing patient portion amount.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_CYCLE_AGING_DATE
columns.description: The Hospital Billing follow-up cycle aging date.

columns.name: IS_INFORMATIONAL_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not this is informational (meaning the amount due is zero).

columns.name: PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: The Hospital Billing previous insurance balance.

columns.name: NEW_INS_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new insurance charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new insurance payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new insurance adjustment amount.

columns.name: CURR_INS_BAL
columns.description: The Hospital Billing current insurance balance.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new patient charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new patient payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing new patient adjustment amount.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_MONTH_AMT
columns.description: The Hospital Billing payment plan monthly amount.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_CARD_ID
columns.description: The payment method that is used for the guarantor's Auto Pay.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_DATE
columns.description: Date to charge the payment method for this specific statement if its guarantor is on Auto Pay.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The amount to be charged to the payment method for this specific statement if its guarantor is on Auto Pay.
